mapper.select: SELECT vsa.id AS applyId, vsa.space_id, vsa.`status`, vsa.created_by, JSON_EXTRACT(vpn.notify_body, CONCAT('$.', #{applyStatusKey})) AS notifyApplyStatus FROM ${tablePrefix}player_notification vpn LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_apply vsa ON vpn.space_id = vsa.space_id AND vpn.from_user = vsa.created_by AND vsa.id = JSON_EXTRACT(vpn.notify_body, CONCAT('$.', #{applyIdKey})) WHERE vpn.id = #{notifyId} AND vpn.to_user = #{toUser} AND vpn.template_id = #{templateId} AND vpn.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tablePrefix}space_apply(id, space_id, status, created_by) VALUE (#{entity.id}, #{entity.spaceId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createdBy})
